person.persName: Bernard Henry Gotthelf (Louisville, Kentucky, Jewish rabbi and U.S. Army chaplain)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, Jewish rabbi and U.S. Army chaplain. Native of Bavaria. Married to Sophia Landau Gotthelf in 1839. Father of Dorothea Gotthelf, Joseph Gotthelf, Isaac Gotthelf, Clara Gotthelf, and Rosa Gotthelf. Emigrated to the United States in 1840. Ministered to the Keneseth Israel Congregation in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, from 1842 to 1849. Relocated to Louisville in 1849. Cantor and shohet of the German Hebrew congregation of Adath Israel in Louisville from 1849 to 1871. Chaplain for United States Army hospitals in and around Louisville from May 1863 to August 1865.
